A message to the Philadelphian Society whithersoever dispersed over the whole earth. Together with, a call to the several gathered churches among Protestants in this nation of England. By J. Lead. Lead, Jane, 1623-1704.
[2], xvii, xix-xx, [1], 108 p.
printed and sold by J. Bradford, at Jewen-Street, near Crowder's-Well, London : 1696.
Title page is a2. With separate dated title page, lacking author statement, on p. 1. With numerous mispaginations. Text appears continuous despite pagination. Reproduction of the original in the Lambeth Palace Library, London.
=======

printed and sold by J. Bradford, at Jewen-Street, near Crowder's-Well, London : 1696.
Title page is a2. With separate dated title page, lacking author statement, on p. 1. With numerous mispaginations. Text appears continuous despite pagination. Reproduction of the original in the Lambeth Palace Library, London.
